fields.text:
The Beginning

VueJS was created by Evan You in 2014. He used to work for Google in projects using AngularJS. He found AngularJS had parts he could eliminate to make it lighter and thus came about VueJS.

Rise in Popularity

Over the years VueJS has gained significant popularity among developers due to its simplicity and easy learning curve.

Current Status

Today, VueJS has grown into a mature framework, powering many high-traffic websites worldwide.
